Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arrow, Chevron, Plus, Sun

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class Piece defines the structure of a Piece object played in the Webale Chess. Piece objects have specific types i.e Sun, Triangle, Chevron, Plus, Arrow. A Piece belongs to a Player and marked by the side the Player represents: red/blue.

      • setIconFile

        public void setIconFile(java.lang.String iconFile)
        Sets the icon file name for this respective piece. This method appends subclass' iconFile String representing piece type's name with the side name to the front of it. e.g "Red" + "Arrow.png" = "RedArrow.png"
        Parameters:
        iconFile - the iconFile to set

      • move

        public abstract boolean move(Square start,
                             Square end)
        Checks if the selected piece can move to another square specified by the player
        Parameters:
        start - Square containing the selected piece to be moved
        end - Destination square for the piece's movement
        Returns:
        validity of this piece to move to the end square
